title_elevator_selling_installation_and_: Sale, installation and maintenance of elevators
title_commercial_facilities_maintenance: Commercial facilities and residential buildings maintenance
about_us_top_text: «ZAVIISKYI & KABACHEK BUSINESS COMPANY» specializes on client services in the following spheres:
about_us_service_three: - commercial facilities and domestic buildings maintenance.
about_us_last_paragraph: The payment is taken only for the rendered services, and our qualified specialists will implement all the necessary work within the established timeframe for an affordable price.
why_us_reason_one: After gaining years of experience, our team has decided to start a company in Spain. Now our target is to show our potential clients the full range of our services which are highly demanded nowadays.
why_us_reason_two: We implement elevator maintenance on the highest level, use up-to-date technology, work with qualified specialists, are reliable and strive to have a long and mutually beneficial cooperation with our partners and clients.
why_us_reason_three: Our company ensures a personal approach to solving your issues, reliability (our priority is mutually beneficial and long-term cooperation), using up-to-date technology and equipment on the object, implementing the works within the established timeframe.
our_experience_title: During the last five years our company:
our_experience_achievement_one: Has been servicing more than 1000 elevators in Ukraine
our_experience_achievement_two: Has been ensuring maintenance of 62 houses as a managing company
our_experience_achievement_three: Has fulfilled about 325 contracts on elevator equipment repair
our_experience_achievement_four: Has had more than 500 fulfilled contracts with institutions that are being funded by the national budget of Ukraine
construction_page_headline: You need to perform construction and assembly work, but don’t know where to find reliable and quality specialists?
construction_page_paragrapgh_one: Our company provides package solution in the sphere of engineering, assembling and technical maintenance with reasonable prices for clients.
construction_page_reason_title: The benefits of cooperating with us are:
construction_page_reason_one: The implementation of any common construction works in the established timeframes
construction_page_reason_two: Using only quality European materials for construction
construction_page_reason_three: Implementing works only by qualified personnel and specialists
construction_page_paragrapgh_two: The main task of our engineering department is to show the client the real quality of work implementation for an appropriate price.
construction_page_paragrapgh_three: The experience of our specialists will not let you doubt about choosing our company.
construction_page_service_one_text: Preparing draft and specification documents for construction, major repairs, and reconstruction
construction_page_service_two_text: We implement any common construction works: pouring foundation, building walls (by framework or monolithic technology, from sawn-timber, bricks, blocks), installation of flooring, roofing, façade finishing
construction_page_service_three_text: Works are implemented for housing estates (multicompartment buildings, private residences, country houses, flats), commercial facilities (offices, shopping centers and business centers)
